appDesc.message: A simple tool to help keep track of time spent on tasks such as work, studies, or other things.

confClearAllHistory.message: Are you sure you want to clear the history of all tasks?

confClearHistory.message: Are you sure you want to clear the history of task "$taskName$"?

confDeleteAll.message: Are you sure you want to delete all of your tasks?

confDeleteTask.message:
Are you sure you want to delete task "$taskName$"?
This will delete the task's history as well.

confRating.message:
Would you like to give this app a rating/review on the Chrome Web Store?
It really helps out!

confResetAll.message: Are you sure you want to reset the time spent on all of your tasks?

confResetData.message:
Are you sure you want to wipe all of Task Timer's data completely?
This will get rid of your tasks and settings.

confResetSettings.message: Are you sure you want to reset all of the settings back to their default values?

confResetTask.message:
Are you sure you want to reset task "$taskName$"?
This will not reset the task's history.

confSmallWindow.message:
You seem to be running Task Timer in a small window, small monitor, or at a low resolution. Would you like to switch to icons instead of buttons in the task list? This will help make sure that tasks don't take up more than one line each.

This setting can also be changed in the tools menu.

confUpdated.message:
Task Timer has been updated to version $version$!
Would you like to see the changelog?

confUpdatedRestartAddendum.message: Be aware that you will need to start your tasks again if Chrome auto-updated the app while any were running.

errAlreadyOpen.message:
The app is already open.
If this appears to be incorrect, press the reload button below. Task Timer will be reloaded as if you closed Chrome.

infoData.message:
Note: This only saves locally, on your computer, in your browser.
Don't worry, your tasks will **not** be deleted if you clear Chrome's cache/storage.

infoPerformance.message:
Is the app running slowly for you? Try increasing the pie chart update time in the settings, or disabling pie charts completely.
Still running slowly? Increase the general update time or disable task history tracking.

infoSettings.message:
Make sure to check out the settings by clicking on the gear button in the top right corner of the app!
There are settings such as desktop notifications for when a task finishes.

infoTotals.message:
This is the totals row. It only appears when you have more than one task.

The "Time Spent" column of this row totals the time spent on every single one of your tasks.
The "Goal" column of this row totals all of the goal times from all of your tasks, other than indefinite ones.
The "Progress" column of this row gives you the total progress towards finishing the goals of all of your tasks. This progress does not include time spent that went over a task's goal, or time spent on tasks with indefinite goals.

infoTranslate.message: Want to help translate Task Timer to other languages? Click [here].

noteNoLocalFiles.message:
It looks like you're using a path to a local file on your machine for the custom sound URL.
Unfortunately, local files cannot be used, as Chrome does not allow access to your local filesystem, even for a sound.
Only internet URLs (beginning with http, https, or ftp) can be used. This means that you need to find a sound online, or upload the sound that you want somewhere.

noteNotifsWorkBody.message: You seeing this means desktop notifications are enabled and working correctly! Woo!

opt12Hour.message: Use 12-hour format for times where applicable

optBackgroundRunning.message: Keep timing tasks while the app is closed

optCombineSmallSlices.message: Combine small slices of the chart into "Other"

optConfirmDelete.message: Ask to confirm when you attempt to delete a task

optConfirmReset.message: Ask to confirm when you attempt to reset a task

optCustomDialogs.message: Use custom dialogs rather than Chrome's built-in ones

optEnableSync.message: Enable synch (EXPERIMENTAL, may mess with your tasks)

optLoopSound.message: Loop the sound until you stop it

optNoOvertime.message: Don't allow tasks to go over their goals

optOnlyOne.message: Only allow one task to be running at a time

optPlaySound.message: Play a sound when a task reaches its goal

optSaveFields.message: Keep what you have in the new task fields when you relaunch the app

optShowNotification.message: Show a desktop notification when a task reaches its goal

optShowPopup.message: Show a popup on the page when a task reaches its goal

optStopTimer.message: Stop a task when it reaches its goal

optTrackHistory.message: Track task history (so you can view statistics for each task)

optUpdateAlert.message: Open the app when it is updated

optUpdateTime1.message: Update the time of tasks every

optUseIcons.message: Use icons in place of buttons for the task options (good for small screens)

sucSyncSent.message: Sent the task data for synching!

toolClearData.message: Clear all of the app's data

toolExportCSV.message: Export tasks as a CSV file

tskExcludeCharts.message: Exclude this task from the pie charts

tskExcludeTotals.message: Exclude this task from the totals row

txtBugInfo.message:
To report a bug, please click [here].
If nobody has already reported the same bug, click "New Issue". Make sure to title the issue descriptively!
If you have found multiple bugs, please create a separate issue for each one.
Be sure to include the below data in your bug report:

txtDescription.message: Use this tool to keep track of time that you spend on work, studies, or any other type of task.

txtEditTasks.message: Double-click a task name, time, or goal to edit it.

txtHistoryDisabled.message: Task history tracking is disabled. You can enable it in the tools menu.

txtJSError.message: An error has occurred somewhere with the script. Please report a bug with the following information, as well as what you did/what happened:

txtNoHistory.message: There is no saved history on that day.

txtNoTasks.message: You haven't created any tasks yet!

txtSuggestionInfo.message:
To make a suggestion, please click [here].
If nobody has already suggested the same idea, click "New issue". Make sure to select "Enhancement Request" for the template, and title it descriptively!
If you have multiple ideas, please create a separate issue for each one.

txtTriedRefresh.message: Have you tried refreshing the app?

txtUsualFix.message: This will usually fix any errors, but will clear all of your tasks and settings.
